stepTitle:
Consider the two allotropes of sulfur: rhombic sulfur and monoclinic sulfur. Given the following thermodynamic data, determine which allotrope is more stable at standard conditions (298 K):

Rhombic sulfur: ΔH°_f $$=$$ $$0$$ $$ rac{kJ}{mol}$$, S° $$=$$ $$31.88$$ $$ rac{J}{mol·K}$$
Monoclinic sulfur: ΔH°_f $$=$$ $$0.30$$ $$ rac{kJ}{mol}$$, S° $$=$$ $$32.60$$ $$ rac{J}{mol·K}$$
